solution_line_template: On one trip, the pickup carries {bags_per_trip} bags * {weight_per_bag_kg} kg/bag = <<{bags_per_trip}*{weight_per_bag_kg}={weight_per_trip_kg}>>{weight_per_trip_kg}kg of onions

After {num_trips} trips, the total weight of onions transported to the store is {num_trips} trips * {weight_per_trip_kg} kg/trip = <<{num_trips}*{weight_per_trip_kg}={total_weight_kg}>>{total_weight_kg} kgs
